title: Intensive Short-term Course for Enhancing Mathematical Thinking in Adult Literacy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Skills and Understanding of Fundamental Mathematical Concepts in Daily Life
context.additional_context: A real-time interactive environment using digital devices, where most learners aim to reacquire foundational math skills as part of lifelong education.

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical reasoning processes in three or more steps to solve real-life problems
Learners can utilize basic mathematical terminology (fractions, ratios, percentages, etc.) with 90% accuracy
Learners can simulate simple math problem-solving processes using provided digital tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
